title: Create a Piping Isometric Drawing
description: A piping designer needs to create an isometric drawing (iso) for a single pipeline, which will be used by the fabrication shop.

tasks.description: Select the pipeline from the 3D model.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly selects the specific pipeline to be detailed.

tasks.description: Run the automatic iso generation tool.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system automatically generates an isometric drawing of the pipeline.

tasks.description: Add any necessary annotations or dimensions to the drawing and submit it for checking.
tasks.expected_outcome: The designer cleans up the drawing, adds required notes, and submits it for review.
